backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing feature evidence, components, and related files for two Valentine’s illustration update features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing all frontend files and their roles in the Valentine’s experience.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining theme color variables for light and dark modes with Valentine‑styled palettes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component coordinating scene progression, scrolling, and asset preloading.
frontend/src/components/valentine/assets: Exports asset paths for images and audio used across Valentine components.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Contin: Floating continue button with bounce animation for scene transitions.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Letter: Exports the static Valentine letter text.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Loadin: Full‑screen loading overlay showing progress bar and themed visuals.
frontend/src/components/valentine/MovieT: Interactive bouncing ticket scene with catch‑to‑reveal mechanic and unlock gating.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Openin: Mailbox‑to‑envelope‑to‑letter interaction with ambient audio and continue prompt.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Scratc: React component showing a scratch-off frame that reveals an illustration once scratched past 60%.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAmbientAudio.ts: Hook for playing and stopping looping background audio with controlled state.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetPreloader.ts: Preloads Valentine assets and tracks loading progress for images and audio.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file exporting nothing for backend queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useScratchOffCanvas.t: Hook implementing scratch-off canvas logic, tracking scratched percentage and handling pointer events.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind setup and custom Valentine-themed colors, fonts, utilities, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color variables, playful fonts, rounded radii, shadows, and numerous custom animations/keyframes for UI effects.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current state, known issues, required image updates, and design direction changes for the interactive Valentine’s experience.
